descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#00ffff][size=6][font=Comic Sans MS]Morwen
[/font][/size][/color][font=Comic Sans MS][color=#a2c4c9]
(Maid)

[/color][/font]~Now Part of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/78307/?]The Femme Fatale Follower Pack[/url]~
[color=#a2c4c9]
[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/q7aoxbrbb/20160824221030_1.jpg[/img]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/q8kmqqt53/Info.png[/img]
[/color][font=Comic Sans MS]Name:  Morwen[/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS]Race:  Nord[/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS]Voice:  Female Eager[/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS]Marriageable:  Yes[/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS]Weight:  100[/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS]Height:  1[/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS]Body:  UNP, CBBE, and SeveNBase options[/font]

[font=Comic Sans MS]Skin:  Fair Skin (Uncompressed & Optimized Versions)[/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS]*Uncompressed Used In Screenshots*[/font]

[font=Comic Sans MS]Weapon:  Northern Spirit - Nordic Arsenal[/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS]Armor:  Nordic Carved Bikini Armor[/font]

[font=Comic Sans MS]Class:  Combat Assassin[/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS]Combat Style:  Boss 1-Handed[/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS]Location:  Winterhold - Frozen Hearth[/font]

[font=Comic Sans MS]Levels with player.  Nord traits/bonuses.[/font]

[font=Comic Sans MS]Tested with AFT & EFF[/font]

[font=Comic Sans MS][img]https://s5.postimg.cc/wmeb7qnev/20160824221254_1.jpg[/img][/font]

[font=Comic Sans MS][img]https://s5.postimg.cc/czbb4dts7/Requirements.png[/img][/font]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53996/?]HDT[/url]
[font=Comic Sans MS] (Armor Requirement)(Naked Version for those who do not like HDT)[/font]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68000/?]XPMSE[/url]
[font=Comic Sans MS](Armor Requirement or bounce for naked version)[/font]

[font=Comic Sans MS][img]https://s5.postimg.cc/3q94u9kw7/Recommended.png[/img][/font]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34996/?]aMidianBorn Nordic Carved[/url]

[font=Comic Sans MS][img]https://s5.postimg.cc/e7z6q0lqf/Installation.png[/img][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS]Manual or your favorite mod manager.[/font]

[font=Comic Sans MS][img]https://s5.postimg.cc/4v36zn7d3/Uninstall.png[/img][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS]Manual removal of all Morwen files or your favorite mod manager.[/font]

[font=Comic Sans MS][img]https://s5.postimg.cc/iidullqtj/Known+Issues.png[/img][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS]None at this time.[/font]

[font=Comic Sans MS][img]https://s5.postimg.cc/w0kqxw2yv/Many+Thanks To.png[/img][/font]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/10858658/?]sfeile[/url]
[url=https://www.facebook.com/groups/755816797880543/]Bethesda Mod Creation Collective[/url]

[font=Comic Sans MS][img]https://s5.postimg.cc/cdhquj9c7/CreditsResources.png[/img][/font]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77314/?]Northern Spirit - Nordic Arsenal[/url]
[url=http://mod.dysintropi.me/nordic-carved-bikini-for-7bo/]Nordic Carved Bikini Armor[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6709/?]Dimonized UNP[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]CBBE[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36992/?]SeveNBase[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49015/?]Bodyslide[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]RaceMenu[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/?]Fair Skin[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49963/?]True Eyes[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?]Brows[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS Hairdo's[/url]
[url=http://www.loverslab.com/files/file/3148-yevmods-makeup-pack-ymmp-2k-4k/]YevMods - Makeup Pack[/url]

[font=Comic Sans MS]*If I forgot anyone please kindly remind me.  Thank You.[/font]

[font=Comic Sans MS][img]https://s5.postimg.cc/b4ygmn6rr/Permissions.png[/img][/font]
[font=Comic Sans MS]This follower is a combination of the work of others.  Please seek their permissions in addition to mine.[/font]

[font=Comic Sans MS][img]https://s5.postimg.cc/fzwqynuh3/20160824221305_1.jpg[/img][/font]

[color=#00ffff][size=4]PLEASE CHECK OUT MY OTHER FOLLOWERS:
[/size][/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/35629995/?tb=mods&pUp=1][img]https://s5.postimg.cc/vn7axqznr/mfeile1974_Link.png[/img][/url]

[font=Verdana][color=#00ffff][size=5]HOT FILES 8/29/2016!!  THANK YOU EVERYONE!![/size][/color][/font]

[img]https://s5.postimg.cc/vwvzer3t3/morwenhotfiles.png[/img][/center]
